Reviews.Title: to be avoided if you care about picture quality
Reviews.Author: tril
Reviews.Content: this led tv has a very poor picture quality.  it is ok for recently made programming with well lit scenes, but anything that has low lighting, all detail turns into blobs of grey black.there are many led tvs that avoid this problem.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: jessL
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV at least 5 years ago and I haven't had a single problem with it. The picture is clear and sharp, and the sound is excellent. This was a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Very bad purchase
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This thing didn't last a year! Screen went black and sound muted in the 10th month of use. Repair shop guy said to use it for shooting practice 'cause it isn't worth fixing! Now it's setting at the back of my junk pile with 30 holes made with my 9mm.

ProductInfo.Features:
32-inch LED TV with ultra slim cabinet - depth less than 1.22-inches
Full HD 1080p with 120Hz full motion; Dynamic contrast ratio 80,000:1
4 HDMI, PC input, 2 component inputs
USB input for video, audio and digital pictures; Pause live TV with USB TimeShift
SRS TruSurround XT Sound; Sound leveler with distortion control; 2x10W output
1080P Resolution
120 Hz Refresh Rate
32" Led Color Display
Ultra-Slim Edge Led
ProductInfo.Name: Haier HL32XSLW2 White 32-Inch Ultra Slim LED 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV
